metadata.title: CVE-2025-21698 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Revert "usb: gadget: u_serial: Disable ep before setting port to null tofix the crash caused by port being null"This reverts commit 13014969cbf07f18d62ceea40bd8ca8ec9d36cec.It is reported to cause crashes on Tegra systems, so revert it for now.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
